  16. /* Stubs to let OCaml programs use the run library */

  18. ‌#define _GNU_SOURCE

  20. ‌#define CAML_INTERNALS

  22. #include <stdio.h>
  23. #include <stdlib.h>
  24. #include <stdarg.h>
  25. #include <sys/types.h>
  26. #include <string.h>

  28. #include "run.h"

  30. #include "caml/mlvalues.h"
  31. #include "caml/memory.h"
  32. #include "caml/io.h"
  33. #include "caml/osdeps.h"

  35. /* cstringvect: inspired by similar function in otherlibs/unix/cstringv.c */
  36. ‌static array cstringvect(value arg)
  37. {
  38.   array res;
  39.   mlsize_t size, i;

  41.   size = Wosize_val(arg);
  42.   res = (array) caml_stat_alloc((size + 1) * sizeof(char_os *));
  43.   for (i = 0; i < size; i++)
  44.     res[i] = caml_stat_strdup_to_os(String_val(Field(arg, i)));
  45.   res[size] = NULL;
  46.   return res;
  47. }

  49. ‌static void free_cstringvect(array v)
  50. {
  51.   char_os **p;
  52.   for (p = v; *p != NULL; p++)
  53.     caml_stat_free(*p);
  54.   caml_stat_free(v);
  55. }

  57. ‌static void logToChannel(void *voidchannel, const char *fmt, va_list ap)
  58. {
  59.   struct channel *channel = (struct channel *) voidchannel;
  60.   int length, initialTextLength = 512;
  61.   char *text = malloc(512);
  62.   if (text == NULL) return;
  63.   length = vsnprintf(text, initialTextLength, fmt, ap);
  64.   if (length <= 0)
  65.   {
  66.     free(text);
  67.     return;
  68.   }
  69.   if (length > initialTextLength)
  70.   {
  71.     free(text);
  72.     text = malloc(length);
  73.     if (text == NULL) return;
  74.     if (vsnprintf(text, length, fmt, ap) != length) goto end;
  75.   }
  76.   Lock(channel);
  77.   caml_putblock(channel, text, length);
  78.   caml_flush(channel);
  79.   Unlock(channel);
  80. end:
  81.   free(text);
  82. }

  84. ‌CAMLprim value caml_run_command(value caml_settings)
  85. {
  86.   int res;
  87.   command_settings settings;

  89.   CAMLparam1(caml_settings);
  90.   settings.program =
  91.     caml_stat_strdup_to_os(String_val(Field(caml_settings, 0)));
  92.   settings.argv = cstringvect(Field(caml_settings, 1));
  93.   settings.envp = cstringvect(Field(caml_settings, 2));
  94.   settings.stdin_filename =
  95.     caml_stat_strdup_to_os(String_val(Field(caml_settings, 3)));
  96.   settings.stdout_filename =
  97.     caml_stat_strdup_to_os(String_val(Field(caml_settings, 4)));
  98.   settings.stderr_filename =
  99.     caml_stat_strdup_to_os(String_val(Field(caml_settings, 5)));
  100.   settings.append = Bool_val(Field(caml_settings, 6));
  101.   settings.timeout = Int_val(Field(caml_settings, 7));
  102.   settings.logger = logToChannel;
  103.   settings.loggerData = Channel(Field(caml_settings, 8));
  104.   res = run_command(&settings);
  105.   caml_stat_free(settings.program);
  106.   free_cstringvect(settings.argv);
  107.   free_cstringvect(settings.envp);
  108.   caml_stat_free(settings.stdin_filename);
  109.   caml_stat_free(settings.stdout_filename);
  110.   caml_stat_free(settings.stderr_filename);
  111.   CAMLreturn(Val_int(res));
  112. }
